channel.title: How Many Tracks Do You Write Daily?
channel.description:
Hey guys, I've been using Auxy for about a year now and I've written almost 2,000 tracks with it. Every week I find myself writing better and better songs. I came in with almost no knowledge of music making whatsoever. I didn't even know what a chord was. I've come so far now, and I often find myself writing at least three to four tracks a day. This got me wondering how many tracks you guys write daily!
Do you do several a day, one a day, or spend longer and write songs every now and then?

item.title: How Many Tracks Do You Write Daily?
item.dc:creator: brandnaqua
item.description:
I try to write at least one new one a day on my phone and then as time goes on I throw it on to the iPad once it‚Äôs a polished concept. Then on the iPad it goes from concept to song. I name them based off of emotions: as in what the song reminds me of and makes me feel like. Gradually they grow, develop, mature, and change, until I feel like they are a fully cooked meal. Earlier on though I would rush just to prove I could make a song, now I take it more seriously in the sense that I let them grow and develop instead of rushing the process just to put something out.

Read full topic

item.source: How Many Tracks Do You Write Daily?

item.title: How Many Tracks Do You Write Daily?
item.dc:creator: Iso
item.description:
August last year I challenged myself to write one track each day for 30 days, regardless of energy levels or other commitments. It was tough at times and some are truly awful disasters that I still raise my eyebrows to, and a few moments which inspired other takes later. Out of them, there were around 7 keepers, so I created a project template in Logic Pro X for Auxy tracks, and exported the stems and midi files from Auxy and imported them into the project. Out of that, there were 3 that I got close to putting into production, and Arturia V Collection was a natural fit. A little bit of editing and resamplng and some obnoxiously over the top Sugar Bytes mangling‚Ä¶ it was great fun, and I still want to revisit them. Lately though, I just don‚Äôt seem to have the time, but with all the commuting, I‚Äôd say about 5 tracks over two weeks, usually only 1 worth developing‚Ä¶ often just snippets or practice runs. I have a lot of love for Auxy, but like with all great tools, I take a break every now and again. Still love trying to break it and push its boundaries! Ha ha ha

Read full topic
item.source: How Many Tracks Do You Write Daily?
